• Image-to-HTML converter that transforms uploaded images into text-based HTML representations
  • Configurable settings for text type (sequence/random), width, characters, background color, and font size
  • Supports grayscale and contrast adjustments with real-time preview and export options (HTML, SVG, PNG)

    function generateTextImage(ctx, width, height) { let result = ''; for (let y = 0; y < height; y++) { for (let x = 0; x < width; x++) { const pixelData = ctx.getImageData(x, y, 1, 1).data; const color = `rgb(${pixelData[0]}, ${pixelData[1]}, ${pixelData[2]})`; result += `` + nextCharacter() + ``; } result += '<br>'; } return result; }

This JavaScript application converts uploaded images into HTML text representations with customizable settings. Users can adjust text type, character width, font size, and color scheme, then export the results as HTML, SVG, or PNG formats. The tool includes contrast enhancement and grayscale options for improved visual output.
